TopicTitle: If you gave a mod dev hotpockets and only a week of time,

Articles.Content: At least 75% of the bugs will be gone forever.
But if you give Squad six months worth of paid labor, they just introduce more than there were already.
Unless Kethane does it better, and then they cross it off as it's available to us.

What percentage of bugs are already covered by [Stock Bug Fix Modules](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97285-KSP-v0-90-Stock-Bug-Fix-Modules-%28Release-v0-1-7d-28-Feb-15%29-Misc-Utilities-%2818-Jan-15%29?p=1486867&viewfull=1#post1486867)?

> 
> What percentage of bugs are already covered by [Stock Bug Fix Modules](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97285-KSP-v0-90-Stock-Bug-Fix-Modules-%28Release-v0-1-7d-28-Feb-15%29-Misc-Utilities-%2818-Jan-15%29?p=1486867&viewfull=1#post1486867)?

1% of them, check out: [bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com](http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-09T04:34:17Z" title="03/09/2015 04:34  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 9, 2015</time> by RobotsAndSpaceships**

This thread serves no purpose except to disparage the people who make the game we all enjoy, and will be closed now. Specific issues can be raised in [Suggestions and Development Discussion](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/59-Suggestions-and-Development-Discussion), but please do not start threads merely to complain.
